title: WTB: Rossman PSA 5 or 4. Last Common Needed to Complete 520
author: Bobbycee

posts.post_title: WTB: Rossman PSA 5 or 4. Last Common Needed to Complete 520
posts.post_content: Looking for help from fellow Net 54'ers.  Rossman in preferably a PSA 5 but would be glad with a PSA 4 as well.  Please let me know if you have 1 to sell.  Thank you.  Bob
Still looking for the elusive Rossman in a PSA 5 or 4.  Thanks!
